activities: Receipt of anonymous user activity on publisher sites as sent by mobile supply side platforms used within a mobile real time exchange bidding environment for advertisers, agencies and demand side platforms to reach advertising audience segments.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: We collect data in connection with serving advertising messages on computers, mobile phones and other digital devices. This data is considered non-personally identifiable in most jurisdictions and we take reasonable steps to further de-identify such data.
recoursemech: BBB EU SAFE HARBOR, operated by the Council of Better Business Bureaus.
